TITLE: You decide what to invest in
TERMS_AND_PRIVACY: I authorize the processing of personal data and accept the privacy notice

COMPANY.TITLE: About the Company
COMPANY.MISSION: Our mission is to design and offer innovative and secure financial solutions that facilitate access to credit, promote the economic growth of our clients, and foster financial inclusion.
COMPANY.VISION: We aspire to be leaders in the development of transformative financial instruments, setting new standards of excellence and generating long-term value for all our stakeholders.
COMPANY.QUALITY: We are committed to maintaining a quality policy based on continuous improvement, transparency, and ongoing training, ensuring reliable services and relationships based on trust and professional ethics.

DOCUMENTATION.TITLE: Documentation and regulations
DOCUMENTATION.P1: This section compiles the documentation and regulations that govern our operations. Our commitment is to ensure transparency and compliance with the legal and quality standards established by the relevant authorities.
DOCUMENTATION.P2: Internal documentation includes operational procedures, security policies, quality guidelines, audit protocols, and regulatory compliance frameworks. Each document has been designed to ensure integrity, efficiency, and accountability in all our processes.
DOCUMENTATION.P3: We are committed to keeping this documentation up to date and available to our employees and clients, ensuring that all company areas operate under the highest standards of excellence and professional ethics.

LEGAL_NOTICE.TITLE: Legal Notice
LEGAL_NOTICE.P1: This Legal Notice governs access to and use of the website, as well as the services offered on it. The user agrees to use the information and content of the site in accordance with current legislation and the established conditions.
LEGAL_NOTICE.P2: The company is not responsible for any damage or harm that may result from the improper use of the information contained on this site. Likewise, the total or partial reproduction of its content without proper authorization is prohibited.
LEGAL_NOTICE.P3: Access to the website implies full and unconditional acceptance of this Legal Notice and any terms and conditions that may supplement it, with the user being obliged to comply with all applicable legal regulations and provisions.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.P1: In compliance with Law 1581 of 2012 and other complementary regulations in Colombia, this Privacy Policy aims to protect and ensure the proper management of our users' personal information.
PRIVACY.P2: The information you provide us, either directly or through browsing our website, is collected, used, and stored confidentially, solely and exclusively for authorized purposes, such as improving services, personalizing the user experience, and complying with legal obligations.
PRIVACY.P3: We implement administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except where required by law.
PRIVACY.P4: You have the right to access, update, rectify, and request the deletion of your personal data. To exercise these rights, you can contact us through the means provided on our website.
PRIVACY.P5: By using our website, you accept the terms of this Privacy Policy, acknowledging that we reserve the right to make modifications to it. We recommend reviewing this section periodically to stay informed of possible changes.
